elements.title: Zhou Enshou
elements.contents: ... that Zhou Enshou (pictured) was arrested during the Cultural Revolution on the orders of his own brother?

elements.title: 2023 Coronation Street Christmas Day episode
elements.contents: ... that viewers complained that the 2023 Coronation Street Christmas Day episode was only 30 minutes long?

elements.title: Wilf Pine
elements.contents: ... that Wilf Pine, manager of Black Sabbath, had his arm dislocated by a vibrating bed because Ozzy Osbourne kept feeding it quarters?

elements.title: SS Virago
elements.contents: ... that the wreck of SS Virago, which sank off Alderney in 1882 with the loss of all crew members, was not discovered for 127 years?

elements.title: João Barrento
elements.contents: ... that João Barrento had been a distinguished equestrian in Portugal since he was a teenager, but only made his Olympic debut in his forties?

elements.title: Timebomb
elements.contents: ... that Kylie Minogue released "Timebomb" after attracting 25,000 tweets in less than 45 minutes?

elements.title: John Jonik
elements.contents: ... that a community mural inspired by John Jonik's pet duck was destroyed by a cleanup crew who mistook it for graffiti?

elements.title: Blargies prison camp
elements.contents: ... that the British Army deliberately kept conditions at Blargies prison camp poor to prevent soldiers on the Western Front from viewing it as a "soft" alternative to combat?

elements.title: Terry Brown
elements.contents: ... that Terry Brown is reported to have founded an escort service using helicopters for remote rural areas?
